items.sentence: Tom promised you that he'd do that, didn't he?
I didn't even know that Tom wanted to do that.
I didn't even know that Tom needed to do that.
It wouldn't be appropriate for you to do that.
Tom told me he thought Mary wanted to do that.
Tom said he wasn't sure that he could do that.
Tom said that he was glad that he'd done that.
Tom said that he suspected Mary would do that.
Tom said he knew the reason why Mary did that.
Tom said that he isn't planning on doing that.
